website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a shoe that can stand up to everyday walking, this is a good buy that's also sophisticated.
pros: Customers give this shoe top marks when it comes to comfort (like most TOMS), and it also stands out for not causing blisters, being easy to slip on and off, and being good quality
We love the colors and luxurious appeal in a comfort shoe
cons: a few also feel they lack arch support and don't hold up to outdoor walking

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made- not sure they are REAL Tom’s
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of Tom’s and I was looking to replace my most worn pair. If this was my first pair, I would never buy them again. Seriously Uncomfortable because of how cheaply they were made. I can pull out the insoles and there is nothing to the shoe. The sole is slippery. I feel like the seams are coming apart after a few wears. My older Tom’s have lasted years! Don’t waste your $.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After wearing them around the house, I determined they ...
customer_reviews.text: After wearing them around the house, I determined they don't fit my foot, Upon reading the return requirements I realized there was no way I could return them for a return for a refund. I have given them to a homeless group. The return restrictions are so restrictive they are not returnable. I won't ever get any other merchandise from this organization.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy O. Dewing

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about these based on other reviews but decided to chance it. I should’ve paid attention to the reviews. I’m pretty sure these are fake. They arrived in a Toms box with all the rags but they look and feel very cheap. The insoles were falling out and don’t fit correctly. They fit my feet very tightly and were very thin. I have a few pairs of Tim’s boots that I love and the quality of these isn’t even comparable. I will be returning these and sticking to the cheaper much higher quality Bobs from now on!
customer_reviews.author: C. Venable

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing the Tom's classic loafer for years! As soon as I wear one out I get another. They are super comfortable with a surprisingly supportive sole with nice arch support (and I have the worse feet with shoes finding comfort). You must order the minimal size you can though (I am usually a size 8 and 7 1/2 with open toe shoe) but I can only wear a 7 1/2 in this loafer or my heel slips up. They are comfy d/t the soft canvas material so my toes do not feel squished. The shoes do wear a long time as well, I just get new pair once mine look too beat up.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine K.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love being able to slip on shoes and go
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love being able to slip on shoes and go. I also do not like how my feet get when I wear flip flops so shoes like Toms and Bobs are great. I absolutely love Toms, but here are a few complaints: *I have wide feet and these are tight. I wear them around the house with socks for a few days before venturing outside *The support is not that great. I recommend Bobs for this. Because of this lack of support, I cannot wear them all day Even with those complaints, I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: LilyBelle

customer_reviews.title: The best flats
customer_reviews.text: Great quality flat! I wore them all summer/fall, I still am on nice days now in late October! They’re getting a bit worn and the toe on one is fraying, but I’ve never had a pair of flats last me this long with almost daily wear. These also offer a little more “support” than other flats I’ve had (as flats, I’m using that word loosely!) Love these shoes, I’ll be buying another pair next season!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great slip-on
customer_reviews.text: A simple, classic TOMS slip-on that fits great even on my wide flat foot. As someone highly sensitive to flats and new shoes in general, I was pleasantly surprised with the first few wears. I felt some rubbing on the back of my foot the first wear but once broken in (this happened very quickly for me) they're really a super slip on. I have them in red and really like the color, it goes with everything. The best part - at first glance these don't appear to be very sturdy, but after an unplanned dirty hike I had to scrub them to see red again and they withstood ALL the elbow grease I put in.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena

customer_reviews.title: Best Espadrilles on the market looks wise !
customer_reviews.text: Great color, perfect 8 for my mid width foot . No toe box issues and breathable . They are flat inside as Toms are but that is expected. If you are looking for arch supports you will need to get a larger size and put in inserts or but another brand but no-one makes a prettier better espadrille than Toms does ! I love them♥️ Very durable and this color is gorgeous !
customer_reviews.author: tonya

customer_reviews.title: Color wrong - I ordered Ash/Grey
customer_reviews.text: The size and fit were correct. I've bought Tom's shoes before and love them! I never wear brown or anything that goes with brown! I spent over an hour with Amazon trying to get this remedied. Had to return the original shoes and order new ones for $12+ more. And they came also in BROWN! Disapointed!!
customer_reviews.author: CMay

customer_reviews.title: Toms Canvas
customer_reviews.text: Never a disappointment when I order Toms.....Ordered for a gift as I have many times before. They are made well of quality materials and always fit well. I like that another pair are donated as well. Always a pleasure doing business with Toms. Were delivered just in time.....could have been a bit quicker with shipping as it was for a gift, but they did get in a day before. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carol K.

customer_reviews.title: ITS A FAKE, DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I think only the blue one is a fake. If you look at the inside closely, you can tell that the blue doesn't have any stitches on the inside. Others all have stitches. The sole was barely glued on. it came out on second use. Its not real TOMS for sure.
customer_reviews.author: g3

customer_reviews.title: Love Toms
customer_reviews.text: Al I wear is Toms because they fit me perfectly, super comfortable, and I can walk in them for hours! I have many different colors. The rope on the bottom part of the shoe is cute a cute nautical look..just attracts all hair or debris on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Morse

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and wonderful shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I went down 1/2 a size based on reviews. I also made sure to purchase from red pine based on reviews. I got a beautiful pair of real Toms, in the original box. They are just a touch tight, but we all know Toms stretch. I love them and I’m really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Tom's are my go to shoes for everyday. Just slip them on and you're good to go all spring and summer long. They're comfortable and cute. I especially love that this company donates one pair of shoes for every pair sold. Love that concept and would support other companies who adopt this policy. These arrived quickly, in perfect condition and just what I wanted. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: luvtoread

customer_reviews.title: Good casual shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Love toms. These are a cute addition for my casual wear. Usually don’t have to break these in a whole lot but the right shoe keeps putting pressure in a weird spot on my ankle. Hopefully it softens up. My first pair I walked all over Europe in so that’s why I keep buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Vasaitis

customer_reviews.title: Kind true to size
customer_reviews.text: I’m 4’11 and my shoe size in woman are usually 6-6.5, with toms there wide ness is a little tight, the more you wear them, the more stretch out they are. I do recommend a 7 because I feel like Toms run a little tiny smaller but over all love the shoes and they came on time which is a extra plus
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Relieved that these seem authentic
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous that these would be knock offs but they look genuine to me. I have Tom's that I purchased directly from their website, and these stand up well in comparison. I bought these in both gray and tan. For the tab pair, the size seems consistent with my other Tom's. The gray pair is just a bit small - I can still wear them, but would recommend sizing up by half a size.
customer_reviews.author: Eliz120

customer_reviews.title: perfect everyday shoe!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my toms! easy slip on and slip off. I’ve been wanting a pair for years now and finally decided to treat myself to a gift. I ordered a half size smaller, as the other reviews said they expand and form to your feet so my usual size of 9 would of been too large. The color is great as it goes with multiple styles and outfit choices. Definitely will be purchasing another pair in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Britanya

customer_reviews.title: Decent cheap slip-ons, but order a size bigger!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Toms a couple years ago and they were solidly ok. Kinda cheap construction and fall apart when you wear them with any frequency, but they're good casual summer shoes. So I reordered the same size and they are wayyyyyyy to small. Had to return them and didn't order another size because all the other options in the colors I liked were $50+ and these shoes aren't worth that. No thanks, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Szafranski

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong with the sizing.
customer_reviews.text: The sizing was weird. For some reason, I have always been a size 6 and a size 6 did not fit me this time. This item changes in price. I bought this item for full price a week ago. It went down by about 10$ this week.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Wang

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Super Comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of these TOMS. I ordered my normal shoe size (7.5) and they fit perfectly. Not too much to say about them - if you like the style of TOMS you'll probably like these just fine. They aren't the most durable or rugged shoes ever so be careful when wearing them for any activity where they may take damage to the sole. It's a casual going shopping kinda shoe not a walking through the deep woods looking for a Geocache kinda shoe.
customer_reviews.author: LizTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good for walkers
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. Fits true to size for narrow feet. I'm a size 6.5 and that's what I got. You will need to break it in if you have wide feet. Also took me two days to soften the back heel. Overall very comfortable and lightweight. My first pair was ruined after being caught in a flashed thunderstorm. The leather insole got drenched and was never the same.
customer_reviews.author: anikko

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of TOMS. The first one was a kids size 2; I bought a women's size 5 and the fit was the same. The color looks like a natural tan but in the light there is a rose gold shimmer to them. Very pretty and it goes with most any outfit in warm weather. I would buy more TOMS in the future for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Malissa T.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, Comfortable, Classic TOMS
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect straight out of the box. They fit true to size as far as I can tell - though they are just a touch snug when first worn. They formed around my foot within hours, though, with no rubbing, so I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Literary Obsession

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair of TOMS, the same exact size and shoe and they have been great. But these shoes that came in the mail don't fit me! They cram my toes together and make them feel like they're going numb. I tried wearing them around the house for a day (really painful) to see if I could break them in but it's not happening. I'm going to be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: RCTID

customer_reviews.title: Leopard Slip ons, size up one!
customer_reviews.text: Love these slip ons. I am a true size 7 and ordered size 7 and it was too small. Thank goodness for Amazon Prime that I received my item so quickly. I ordered a 7.5 and they fit great. I could have even went up a whole size to an 8.
customer_reviews.author: UnCent

customer_reviews.title: Nice neutral color
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect and have lasted through a lot of heavy use. They are true to the pictured color. Mine have some strange discoloration on them but as I'm not sure if it's due to something I stepped in or spilled on them, I won't take away a star. They fit true to my regular shoe size. They seem a bit tight at first but loosen up after a few times wearing them (typical for toms).
customer_reviews.author: Kyle G

customer_reviews.title: Watch buying. Says it is new but for me not the case
customer_reviews.text: The box was torn and it looked like the shoes have been worn. They are cute shoes and I love the color Just wish they would have been in better condition It did describe as new!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kay love 3

customer_reviews.title: NOT TOMS
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money! These shoes are knockoffs and very cheap! They smelled like chemicals and didn't look anything like real TOMS. I immediately returned them
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: I love TOMS shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love TOMS shoes. I know TOMS stretch out over time, but I forgot how small they feel at first. I wear a 7.5 or 8, but I got the 8 just to be safe. By the end of the day (I'm a teacher), I had HUGE blisters on the back of my heels. I could feel them loosen after a couple hours, but it will take a few days of wearing them for them to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Heinze

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed, I kept trying because I really wanted them. I kept ordering a smaller size hoping to get the fit I needed. Toes too long, and they fit loose. After three tries I’m done.
customer_reviews.author: Alva Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Very snug, but you gotta love TOMS
customer_reviews.text: These are snug, but I expect they will stretch some with wear. I wear an 11.5 in sneakers and I think another half-size would have been perfect. I'm keeping them because I like the look and I only plan to use them around the house or at a luau. :) Toms are well made and I was VERY surprised to have so much arch support in a slip-on shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these ! I wear a 8 in toms with my other pair, so I got a 8 & they are so perfect! But it is a 8W(wide), and my feet are very narrow so they feel slightly loose but nothing some back shoe padding can't fix.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Followed the advice of others and bought half a size down, 6.5 instead of 7. They were snug for the first day or two but now fit perfectly, even traveled in them 2 days after I got them and I was comfortable all the way. I like the stripe on this style in particular, makes them a bit different from the usual Toms you see people wearing around.. The Amazon prices are a lot more reasonable than malls/elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rhythmist

customer_reviews.title: FAKE - NOT TOMS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes about 3 years ago and they still are not broken in! I can usually only bare to wear them about 2-3 times a month because they cut open my ankles. They looked legit, but my other two pairs of REAL Toms, that I bought from a shoe store I use to work at, took maybe a day to break in. Huge waste of money. Wish I would have just gone to the store and spent a little extra on the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Stiff But Cute!
customer_reviews.text: The Leopard print is a little wide (otherwise true to size) and kind of stiff. Doesn’t feel as soft as my other Toms. (I have several). But I’m hoping they’ll soften and I really like the print.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Taupe not Grey
customer_reviews.text: I believe these are last year's shoes. I bought one pair in this style last year and it was a little bit narrow, although the shoes stretched with wear. This year's shoes in the same style are wider. My only complaint is the color. They are labeled "light grey." They are actually taupe as they have a beige cast. I will keep them as I have some pants that I can wear them with. However, I'm unable to wear them with my gray jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Q Filmlover

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable. I ordered a 1/2 size larger than I normally wear...they run a little large. Pretty color and great to dress up for a special occasion or where with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Tom's shoes. They are extremely comfortable. I would recommend going with a 1/2 size smaller than your normal size. They do expand with wear. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Willer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a teacher and on my feet all day. I have had some problems with Plantar Fasciitis in the past and the shoes are the only shoes that help. They form perfectly to my feet and provide just enough support. They go with everything. Great teacher shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie roberts

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in the size that I always get from Tom's....when they arrived, you could visibly tell the difference in the right shoe from the left shoe. The right shoe was probably used at a store somewhere as the floor sample---it is stretched out to the point that I cannot wear them. The left shoe fits perfectly. I had these delivered to me overseas, so I am out the money that I paid for them, (Plus the shipping, which was equal to the price of the shoes)---I will never order Tom's outside of Tom's website again! I don't know where these are coming from, but the seller is selling defective merchandise!
customer_reviews.author: Renay West

customer_reviews.title: For the longest time I didn't like Toms, I gave in and tried them on ...
customer_reviews.text: For the longest time I didn't like Toms, I gave in and tried them on when they became so ubiquitous and realized what I was missing out on. They are very comfortable to walk around in most of the day. I know friends who love them and have no trouble but I have high arches and plantar fasciitis and by the end of several hours especially walking on pavement I need more support. I love them for an easy slip on, they break in quickly and mold to your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: I love Toms, and the color on these is great
customer_reviews.text: I love Toms, and the color on these is great! They are a bit snug (I have Toms in size 8, and these are a snug 8.5)...full disclosure though, I am pregnant in the middle of summer so I have to assume my feet have swelled some. Hoping they stretch a bit and they will fit better once this baby is out. :)
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Eh, would not buy again but did not return
customer_reviews.text: The pattern looks like coffee beans and they are super tight and hard to break in even with the correct size. Just not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blisters
customer_reviews.text: You need bandaids! These shoes are great, and comfy, but they give you blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shoe that would be comfortable for neuropathy feet. These were comfortable for a longer period of wear.
customer_reviews.author: The Way Things Are

customer_reviews.title: Doing good while wearing comfy shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to shoes for the house, running errands, going for a walk etc. I am wearing my TOMS to Disneyland too - great for comfort. When you buy TOMS on their site or on Amazon, they donate a pair of shoes to needy children - so you can feel good about your purchase. If you have fallen arches or some foot issues, I would opt for one of the styles with more support, but these are my faves. I have two pairs right now and will always have a set of these available as my daily wear shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: As always, a comfy shoe from Toms
customer_reviews.text: But, as always, the problem with buying shoes online is the color you see/expect might not be the color it really is. These looked more like a light to medium gray, which is what I was looking for, but they're a dark brown-ish vs a whitish gray. I wouldn't call it ash at all, like the standard ash color of gray sweatshirts. So, that was disappointing, since they're not going to go well with the pants I intended to wear them with. But they're Toms, so they're comfortable, and that's always a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: MidwestWriter

customer_reviews.title: Three Season Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I know spring has arrived when I pull out my Toms. I like the zippy stripes on this style, which jazz them up a bit. The fit is perfect. I don't expect canvas espadrilles to survive for years, but the blue ones I bought last year should take me through another spring, summer and fall and I expect the same from these. While they are quite comfortable, they haven't the support needed for extended walking. I appreciate the fact that for every pair of shoes purchased they donate a pair to charity.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Ruddick

customer_reviews.title: Love the leopard print
customer_reviews.text: All my other Toms have been a solid color, so I decided to branch out and ordered the leopard print. They look so cute with jeans. No need for any other flair.....minimal jewelry maybe.
customer_reviews.author: sue j.

customer_reviews.title: Fits my narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: Initially these were a bit narrow for my narrow feet. However they've stretched out slightly and now fit perfectly. I wish Tom's lasted a bit longer than they do, because I love them. The ones I've had in the past last less than a year with frequent use and I expect the same out of these. However, they are comfortable and and I like the way they look with a variety of outfits.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Tight at first
customer_reviews.text: Over all I am happy with my purchase. From reading other reviews they are def tight when you first put them on. I honestly thought they weren’t going to fit. But after a couple of uses they start to loosen up a bit. I have only had them for a couple weeks and worn 2-3x so not sure how long they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing toms for YEARS. Forever my favorite shoe. They go with everything, I Specifically got them for my cosplay costume for C2E2 in Chicago and so happy they work so well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes and bought several pairs. Mild arch support and very comfortable foot bed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Green

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is on the small end.
customer_reviews.text: I returned. To small, go up at lest a full size is my suggestion, other than that they’re great quality and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is not typical of what you'd expect.
customer_reviews.text: I buy this brand and style BECAUSE of the comfort. This shoe (same style as several others I own) is now made with a rough, stiff material on the inside. It's not the soft velvety smooth material used in others. I never expected to get a "shoe-bite" from this shoe, but here we are, blisters on the back of my foot. So disappointed!.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not as well made as they used to be
customer_reviews.text: They are okay- I wish they had arch support like my old pair of Toms- these look the same but are def lacking n any kind of support
customer_reviews.author: saveen kaushal

customer_reviews.title: Color off and color changed in sun - returning
customer_reviews.text: Color is not light grey...lthough the color says light grey, looks more like taupe. All stitching fine and no issues with size. I wear an 8, bought an 8 and fits perfectly. UPDATE: Wore outside in the sun and color of fabric changed to pinkish color... returning!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Momma

customer_reviews.title: Too metallic for me....
customer_reviews.text: To me, the photo didn’t look as metallic as the shoe when I arrived. Too much for me. Sent back ...
customer_reviews.author: Janie in Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: really like the color
customer_reviews.text: its a great color and fit except the toe area seems to be a big saggy lol wrinkles up like maybe my feet arent long enough for them BUT they are. hard to explain. i think being such a light color its more noticed than if i would have went with a darker product. over all i like them but wouldnt buy this specific style again. def would order from this seller though, came very nicely packaged. and i love toms. so though the fit is a bit off it isnt due to the seller so i gave it a 4.
customer_reviews.author: AMF

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I have a high instep and these shoes are a little hard to put on. Once they are on, they feel wonderful and I have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: C. McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of TOMS. They look like nothing, but these shoes are unbelievably comfortable. I have worn them walking for hours, with no problem. I have very hard to fit short feet with very wide toes, but the canvas stretches perfectly, and my toes are not crunched. Support - again, it looks like nothing but there is plenty of good arch support. For someone who has returned more shoes than I have kept, these are at the top of my list. Now, if they'd only figure out how to make warm winter shoes...
customer_reviews.author: Aptos55

customer_reviews.title: Love My Red Toms!!! 😍🎅🏻❤️
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my new Seasonal job at Bath & Body Works...where we can wear Santa hats, Reindeer antlers, etc...along with the usual dress code of jeans, white tops and our red apron - which these red Toms go perfect with :)). They are so comfortable and they really complete the outfit!!! Ho!Ho!Ho!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I liked them but they were to wide. Normally Toms are a perfect fit for me. Length was perfect. Color was cute Has to return.
customer_reviews.author: JannAtBeach

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordere these for a halloween costume and had previously ordered the skechers BOBs but was sent the wrong size, so ordered these. The shoes are amazingly comfortable. I wear them fairly infrequently now, due to the weather, but expect I will wear them a great deal more once spring gets here. They are obviously not as sturdy as a more sneaker type shoe, due to the cotton upper, but as long as you do not try to wear them as thought they are sneakers, I expect mine to last at least a couple more years.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie E. Henshaw

customer_reviews.title: Toms
customer_reviews.text: one of the best shoes to wear in hot weathers
customer_reviews.author: Diego y Fiorella

customer_reviews.title: Just a reminder...
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes but wasn't thinking when I ordered them and actually ordered my normal shoe size. I should of went a half size down. Maybe my feedback will remind someone else before they purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Schatz

customer_reviews.title: Elf shoes
customer_reviews.text: On me, they looked like elf shoes. How is TOMS ethical if it makes its shoes in China?
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Cute pattern
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grown daughter and she loves them. The herringbone pattern is so cute and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy, buy a size smaller than usual
customer_reviews.text: Buy your Tom's a size down. Very comfortable and cute. I am a true 7.5 in all shoes, but I returned the 7.5 in Toms because they run about a size to big. I purchased in a 6.5 from somewhere else and was really happy with them. If you wear these frequently, expect to replace them after a few months. I did wash them a few times in the machine (this is not recommended by the company) on gentle, and this extended my wearing time by a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: JW slacks

customer_reviews.title: Fit was off
customer_reviews.text: The fit was off. Too small. Not attractive to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley M

customer_reviews.title: Great Company and Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are so comfy it's almost like wearing house slippers. Also love what this company stands for and the support they give to children in need.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Toms really are the best
customer_reviews.text: I first saw Toms shoes in a Whole Foods store many years ago and was shocked at how expensive they are so I never purchased them. Last year my 15 year old daughter begged me to buy her a pair so of course I gave in and I am so glad I did. These shoes are incredibly comfortable, even for my bad feet. The only walking shoe that I choose over these Toms is my very expensive running shoe. I have other brands of walking shoes but none are as comfortable as the Toms.
customer_reviews.author: I Love Amazon Prime

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter to wear at her wedding reception. They are beautiful and fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Cute pattern
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were a little stiff at first but after wearing them with socks they stretched out a little bit
customer_reviews.author: madaboutpuggies

customer_reviews.title: The Tom's espadrilles are just fine. They are comfortable and that is important to ...
customer_reviews.text: The Tom's espadrilles are just fine. They are comfortable and that is important to me as I don't want shoes that are tight, pinching my toes and rubbing my heels. The canvas upper is sewn in a stylish design and the stitching is very professional and well done. I am definitely pleased with the Tom's product and will be ordering more very soon. No disappointments and the price is very reasonable considering the workmanship..
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: So cute, great color!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I’m usually a 9- 9 1/2 and i ordered the 9 1/2, they fit perfectly. Color is perfect- a light minty green.
customer_reviews.author: kiki 129

customer_reviews.title: comfy well built
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a trend but super comfortable and cushioned and built well. I bought two and don’t regret it. I’m a size 7 but bought at 7.5 because I like my shoes loose. Stays on and is super comfy
customer_reviews.author: Chika

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable and Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: The material is very thin and feels like plastic. They are not at all comfortable and have weird, sloppy cuts that leave material that pokes into your feet. I wore them for 2 hours and had blisters from that. I am throwing them out and do not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ordonez

customer_reviews.title: Love me some Toms
customer_reviews.text: I always order a full size down on my toms because they stretch after you break them in.
customer_reviews.author: B. Riley

customer_reviews.title: good 1st impression
customer_reviews.text: this is my first Toms product and i am pleased. Quality is good. And from the online pictures o didnt know that this was METALLIC tan. Pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase Decision
customer_reviews.text: Love love! I already had a pair of Red Toms and wanted to replace them because I wear them all the time. I was nervous about ordering a pair off of Amazon but I am so glad I did! The box and shoes came in perfect condition and you could tell they were brand new and look as if they haven't even been tried on. I 100% reccomend these!
customer_reviews.author: NunK

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift she liked and said the shoes were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: These were a little stiffer than the normal ones I buy from toms. But they didn’t hurt my feet or anything. They are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes a super cute and really comfy! I definitely recommend them if you have cold feet and need a little something to keep them warm. I know my shoe shoes in toms for 9.5 was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Fit exactly as expected, so many colors/prints available
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has an enormous selection of colors and prints for Toms! I chose dark grey so I could wear them with nearly anything that I packed for my vacation.
customer_reviews.author: EmporiaHornGirl

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable, which surprised me just how comfy they were! My feet have been feeling, um bigger lately, so I opted for a 1/2 up, but I think a 9 would have fit perfectly. They do give a bit. I'm hoping once they need to be washed that they may shrink a bit. Considering buying another pair in a different color since I love them so much! Well, then of course there is the wonderful feeling of helping a child get a pair of shoes! Can't beat that.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair over several years. Fit true to size. They fit tight at first but they do stretch. So buy true size.
customer_reviews.author: Martha S.

customer_reviews.title: A reliable Tom's style
customer_reviews.text: The color is a medium/dark gray. I have several pair of this style Tom's and love the comfort when wearing them barefoot. They look cute with jeans or for the beach.
customer_reviews.author: ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great company, ok shoe
customer_reviews.text: I want to love Toms, I really do. But they are really not much more than a pricey slip on for quick grocery store trips or walking the dog around the block. The shoe is well made but there is absolutely no support and I can't wear them for long before my knees are aching. I support the brand and their message but at this point I cannot justify spending the money on a shoe that isn't good for all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: danielleion

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for work, they are very comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Canvas color looks yellow
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes and has several pairs. When these first came in he and I were skeptical because they look yellow. Once he had them on it didn’t look as bad.
customer_reviews.author: Danyel York

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Tom's shoes first and foremost because a pair of shoes will be given to a needy child when one is purchased for personal use. I selected this particular shoe because it is navy and I was looking for something that wasn't just plain, if I could. The espadrille design was also an added treat. The shoes fit great, are comfortable, and look good on my feet. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: ljschloss

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my toms!!! This pair is my favorite. I am a size 10 in women's, but I got a 9 because they do stretch out and are more of a comfy fit. I believe doing this only works with the canvas toms. This pair I bought as a replacement because some how I lost my previous pair of red ones. I did not rest until I got another pair. The only critique I have is that now my right tom is making a bit of a clicking or squeeking sound :(.
customer_reviews.author: Jess67

customer_reviews.title: Loved these!
customer_reviews.text: I was told to order a half size smaller by friends, but was hesitant, I always wear a 9, maybe 9.5. I ordered both a 9 & 8.5. The 8.5 was absolutely perfect. I normally wear orthodics in my shoes & I was worried these would be too flat with no support. I was pleasantly surprised to find I could wear these all day with no problems. Love this style, now I am ordering the navy blue ones.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Did TOMS change its shoe size?
customer_reviews.text: I love TOMS and have several pairs. I ordered the same size of TOMS and this pair was surprisingly loose. The pairs that I had bought in the past were snug and loosened up after walking in them for a while. I love the color of the shoes - very bright red. These are perfect for the summer. I would have given this review 5 stars if the shoes weren't loose. I ended up keeping these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: MichSnow

customer_reviews.title: looser than my normal shoes
customer_reviews.text: I just read the big "expose" about how Tom's doesn't actually help the communities they donate shoes to, so I'm feeling a little less like I'm helping out the world with my purchase. BUT it's still a comfortable, light summer shoe. No regrets on that front. They fit a little loose and have gotten even looser since I've worn them and the canvas has stretched a bit. I would buy a half size down next time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. Perfect for dressing up or casual wear. Comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Cee Cee

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and comfortable from the start. The elastic on the top can be a little uncomfortable on a bare foot so it is good to get some no-show socks that come up a little higher on the foot. For a lot of walking they work well with an insole to get a little more cushion and arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: new favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting a pair of TOMS for a long time now and I finally decided to get a pair of them! I LOVE them! I ordered the size I normally wear and they fit great. At first they felt a little tight but then they loosened up after wearing them all day. Now I love them! I got them in Grey and now I really want the red pair!! :-) They are so comfy and look super cute with any outfit! My sister went out and ordered a pair after seeing mine! Can't wait to add more TOMS to my collection!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

product_meta.title: TOMS Canvas Classics
product_meta.description:
Classic alpargata style, canvas upper, elastic gore for easy fit, suede footbed. with every pair of shoes you purchase, toms will give a new pair of shoes to a child in need. one for one

TOMS Shoes was founded in 2006 by Blake Mycoskie. The shoe is a unique slip-on design comprised of clean lines and lightweight fabrics in vibrant colors and prints. TOMS was founded when Blake was inspired on a trip to Argentina by the traditional, rope-soled Argentine "alpargata." He was struck by the poverty and health issues of the country, and set out to reinvent the alpargata for the U.S. market, and in doing so to accomplish one goal: Making life more comfortable for those without shoes. To realize this purpose, Blake made a commitment to match every pair of TOMS purchased with a donation of a pair to a child in need. It's simple: If you buy a pair of TOMS, the company will give a pair to someone in need on your behalf. During its first year in business, TOMS sold 10,000 pairs of shoes, and Blake returned to Argentina to lead his first annual Shoe Drop during which he donated to the children who had inspired him. TOMS Shoes are now available in multiple colors and fabric combinations for men, women and a recently introduced line for children, aptly titled Tiny TOMS.

WARNING:
CHOKING HAZARD -- Small parts. Not for children under 3 yrs. Classic alpargata style, canvas upper, elastic gore for easy fit, suede footbed. with every pair of shoes you purchase, toms will give a new pair of shoes to a child in need. one for one
